synopsis.text:
Thus begins the tale of Letty, a dragon who falls short of the ferocious standards set by his kin. Expelled from his family's lair, Letty embarks on a daunting quest to find a new home. In a world brimming with mythical creatures, where everyone sees him as a potential trophy or a fearsome foe, Letty's timid nature and lack of fire-breathing abilities make his journey all the more challenging.

Enter Dearia, an elvish architect with a knack for real estate and a slightly mischievous streak. Under his guidance, Letty navigates the treacherous world of house-hunting, encountering everything from undead squatters to haunted mansions. Despite the trials and tribulations, Letty remains steadfast in his pursuit of the perfect draconic abode, proving that even a cowardly dragon can embark on an epic adventure. Will Letty find the safe haven he yearns for, or will his journey lead him down a path filled with unexpected dangers and delightful surprises? Only time will tell in this whimsical tale of courage, friendship, and the ultimate quest for a place to call home.
